code: import moment from'moment';import{useCallback}from'react';import{useUrlParams}from'../app';import{useCheckout}from'../checkout';import{URL_KEYS}from'../../Constants';import{useHistory}from'react-router-dom';export function useHandleSurf(){var _useUrlParams=useUrlParams(),urlData=_useUrlParams.urlData;var next=urlData[URL_KEYS.NEXT];var specId=urlData[URL_KEYS.SPECIALIST_ID];var _useHistory=useHistory(),push=_useHistory.push,pathname=_useHistory.location.pathname;var _useCheckout=useCheckout(),comment=_useCheckout.comment,meetDate=_useCheckout.meetDate,activeDay=_useCheckout.activeDay;var handleSurf=useCallback(function(){var url=[];if(specId){url.push("".concat(URL_KEYS.SPECIALIST_ID,"=").concat(specId));}if(activeDay){url.push("".concat(URL_KEYS.DATE,"=").concat(activeDay));}if(meetDate){url.push("".concat(URL_KEYS.TIME,"=").concat(moment(meetDate).format('HH:mm')));}if(comment&&comment.trim().length>0){url.push("".concat(URL_KEYS.TEXT,"=").concat(comment));}url.push("".concat(URL_KEYS.NEXT,"=1"));push({pathname:pathname,search:url.join('&')});},[specId,activeDay,comment,meetDate,pathname,push]);return{handleSurf:handleSurf,next:next};}
